ygData.subject: Re: ebw
ygData.msgSnippet: check out http://everquest.gamestats.com/quests/Q_SKaranas.htm tells ya about the details for grimrots quest
ygData.messageBody:
check out
http://everquest.gamestats.com/quests/Q_SKaranas.htm

tells ya about the details for grimrots quest

Shanti Ashtangi wrote:

> From: "Shanti Ashtangi" <zealpath@...>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
> Sent: July 19, 1999 9:06 PM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: [shadowknight] ebw
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> the quest series started by a necromancer in the bloodsaber's guild area
> (the necro who asks you to kill trumpy for one of his quests) culminates
> in the electrum bladed wakizashi. warning: you will need to meet grimrot
> TWICE to fulfill this quest. that could mean a lot of waiting..
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
> Can we have some more specifics hehe?
> (What town do you have to enter etc, forgive me for sounding stupid if I am
> but as of late quests have been an appealing way to play EQ)
